item.title: Godsword Problem
item.dc:creator: @Elven_Dremor Elven Dremor
item.description:
@Elven_Dremor wrote:

Well were you have.

playerhasItem

Replace all 3 with this.

playerHasItem

This can be your whole code right here to.

[code] if (NPCID == 22) {
if(playerHasItem(995, 1000000)
&& playerHasItem(995, 1000000)
&& playerHasItem(995, 2145000000)) {

 		    deleteItem(995, 1000000);
		    deleteItem(6410, 1000000);
		    deleteItem(6412, 2145000000);

		    addItem(6587, 1);
		    sM("Thank For The 2147Million And Here Are Your D Claws.");
    }

}
[/code]

Read full topic

please reply if u see whats wrong
heres the code

[code]
case 155: //first Click npc
if (NPCID == 22) {
if(playerhasItem(995, 1000000)
&& playerhasItem(995, 1000000)
&& playerhasItem(995, 2145000000)) {

		    deleteItem(995, 1000000);
		    deleteItem(6410, 1000000);
		    deleteItem(6412, 2145000000);

		    addItem(6587, 1);
		    sM("Thank For The 2147Million And Here Are Your D Claws.");

@x_blitz_x wrote:

playerhasItem

Java is case sensitive.

Bigest clue ever.

&& playerHasItem(6410, 1)
&& playerhasItem(6412, 1)) {

		    deleteItem(6408, 1);
		    deleteItem(6410, 1);

item.title: Godsword Problem
item.dc:creator: @Elven_Dremor Elven Dremor
item.description:
@Elven_Dremor wrote:

Hi, I want to make an NPC . Once you click it it will automatically replace the shards with the blade. this is what i got…

Would this Work?, If So, Where would I place it?

if(playerHasItem(6408, 1) && playerHasItem(6410, 1) && (playerhasItem(6412, 1)){ deleteItem(6408, 1); deleteItem(6410, 1); deleteItem(6412, 1); addItem(6474, 1); sM("You get a GodSword Blade."); }

Would this Work?, If So, Where would I place it?

case 6408: c.deleteItem(6408, c.getItemSlot(6408), 1); c.deleteItem(6410, c.getItemSlot(6410), 1); c.deleteItem(6412, c.getItemSlot(6412), 1); c.addItem(6474, 1); break;

Thanks for your help.

Read full topic
